name: Python 3
postCreateCommand:
uv sync --frozen && uv pip install -e . && echo '
# Auto-activate venv and source .env
if [ -f ${containerWorkspaceFolder}/.env ]; then set -a; source ${containerWorkspaceFolder}/.env; set +a; fi
if [ -f ${containerWorkspaceFolder}/.venv/bin/activate ]; then source ${containerWorkspaceFolder}/.venv/bin/activate; fi' >> ~/.zshrc

ADVENT_SESSION_COOKIE.description: (Optional) Advent of Code Session Cookie, used for pulling down per-user puzzle inputs.

ANTHROPIC_API_KEY.description: (Optional) Anthropic API key for extracting example inputs and answers.
